plugins.name: md2wechat
plugins.description: Convert Markdown articles to WeChat Official Account formatted HTML with styled CSS. Supports API mode for quick conversion and AI mode for beautiful themed layouts (autumn-warm, spring-fresh, ocean-calm). Optionally upload to draft box.
